main event: On November 8, 1960, a bright flashing light or object was observed descending from overhead in Cincinnati, Ohio, making a sudden change in direction and speed, hovering momentarily before accelerating and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object was seen moving at high speed erratically, hovering for a brief moment before disappearing., The witness felt that the object was under intelligent control., There was no sound associated with the sighting., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The object was described as bright and flashing.
witness description: Mr. Paul Frazier, a resident of Cincinnati, Ohio
